name: Mysterious Stars: A Fairy Tale
synopsis: Entrusted with the God of the Stars' will, the ability to connect the stars is now yours. The God of the Stars is known to help people when they are in need, but he is getting old and would be pleased if you could help him a little. In order to deliver items that will be useful for the people down there, complete the drawing by connecting the stars. Based on the game that everyone played at least one time in their life, Connect the Dots or also called Dot-to-Dot. The God of the Stars just located a little girl who could be in need of assistance. This little girl is actually living with her foster-mother who doesn't seem to have any tenderness toward her. The woman is greedy and uses the little girl more like a laborer, to sell matches...
